cast.name: 吉恩·古托斯基 Gene Gutowski

this_title: Dancing Before the Enemy: How a Teenage Boy Fooled the Nazis
trans_title: 在敌人面前起舞：一位小伙是如何骗过纳粹而活下来的
introduction: Film producer Gene Gutowski (Repulsion, Cul-de-Sac, The Pianist) was fourteen years old when first the Soviets then the Nazis invaded his hometown of Lwow, Poland. With a combination of chutzpah, street smarts and an unflinching will to live, he spent the war flirting with danger as a teenage Jew hiding in plain site. Witnessing first-hand the unspeakable horrors of the Nazi occupation, frequently cheating death himself and losing his entire family in the process, Gutowski’s story is ultimately one of hope. As recounted with humor and pathos to his son, filmmaker Adam Bardach, his remarkable survival tale represents a thumb of the nose at darkness and totalitarianism.
chinese_title: 在敌人面前起舞：一位小伙是如何骗过纳粹而活下来的
foreign_title: Dancing Before the Enemy: How a Teenage Boy Fooled the Nazis
